meanings.definition: A new or novel form or structure
meanings.sent1: The scientist discovered a neomorph in the plant species.
meanings.sent2: The artist's sculpture showcased a beautiful neomorph.
meanings.sent3: The neomorph in the garden surprised the visitors.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was a neomorph in the world of fashion.
meanings.sent5: The neomorph of technology revolutionized the industry.

meanings.definition: A newly developed characteristic or trait
meanings.sent1: The superhero's neomorph gave him incredible strength.
meanings.sent2: The neomorph of kindness in her personality was evident to all.
meanings.sent3: His sudden love for cooking was a neomorph for his friends.
meanings.sent4: The neomorph of determination in her eyes was inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The neomorph of courage in his actions was admirable.

meanings.definition: To create or produce a new form or structure
meanings.sent1: The architect decided to neomorph the building design.
meanings.sent2: She neomorphed the traditional recipe into a modern dish.
meanings.sent3: The artist neomorphed the canvas into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: He neomorphed the garden layout for a fresh look.
meanings.sent5: They neomorphed the website interface for better user experience.
